        public static void addSuccessfulBid(java.lang.String userid,
                    java.lang.String course,
                    java.lang.String section,
                    double amount)
                             throws java.sql.SQLException
        Add a successful bid into table section-student
        Parameters:
        userid - the id of the student
        course - the course code
        section - the section code
        amount - the amount that the student placed
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveBidsBySection

        public static java.util.List<Bid> retrieveBidsBySection(java.lang.String course,
                                        java.lang.String section)
                                                 throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a specific course and section, this method retrieves all bids made in the Section_Student table. Section_Student Table contains all the successful bids at the end of every clearing round logic.
        Parameters:
        course - the course code
        section - the section code
        Returns:
        List of Bids
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveBidsByStudentCourse

        public static Bid retrieveBidsByStudentCourse(java.lang.String userID,
                              java.lang.String course)
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a specific userID and course code, This method retrieves successful bids made by that student for that particular course. This method only retrieves from Section_Student table (Round 1 only) This method returns null when nothing is found.
        Parameters:
        userID - the unique student ID eg. amy.ng.2009
        course - unique course code. eg. IS200
        Returns:
        the Bid Object
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • retrieveAll

        public static java.util.List<Bid> retrieveAll()
                                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        This method returns all successful bids after round 1 or 2 is cleared. Note: No sorting is done in this method. Returns null when table is empty.
        Returns:
        the bidding list
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • dropStudentSection

        public static void dropStudentSection(Student student,
                      java.lang.String courseCode)
                               throws java.sql.SQLException
        Given a specific student and courseCode, this method removes that particular bid from Section_Student table. Note: Section_Student Table contains all the successful bids at the end of every clearing round logic.
        Parameters:
        student - the unique student ID eg. amy.ng.2009
        courseCode - unique course code. eg. IS200
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
